infos.title: Merchant of Poison
infos.like: Developing new poisons, those who understand the joy of developing new drugs
infos.dislike: People who are prejudiced against poisons
infos.story: A curious merchant who deals every kind of poison known to mankind. She is a daughter of two wandering alchemists who traveled over from a distant nation. Other merchants call her 'the Merchant of Death,' but she has a delifferent opinion. She claims that no poison is inherently evil, and that how one is used determines its nature. Like a true merchant, she believes that any tool is as good or evil as the one who uses it. Since the reappearance of the Demons, she has been traveling around, searching for the right poison to battle against the invaders.
infos.story_: A curious merchant who deals every kind of poison known to mankind. She is a daughter of two wandering alchemists who traveled over from a distant nation. Other merchants call her 'the Merchant of Death,' but she has a different opinion. She claims that no poison is inherently evil, and that how one is used determines its nature. Like a true merchant, she believes that any tool is as good or evil as the one who uses it. Since the reappearance of the Demons, she has been traveling around, searching for the right poison to battle against the invaders.

1.name: Tears of Mr. Python!
1.description: Attacks 2 enemies and deals ??? P.DMG, while poisoning them with [Tears of Mr. Python] that cannot be dispelled for 4.5 sec. Enemies inflicted with [Tears of Mr. Python] cannot recover mana, takes 30% increased DMG, and their Block chance is reduced by 500.

2.name: Screechy Grass Extract!
2.description: Attacks a random enemy 3 times and deals a total of ??? DMG, while poisoning them with [Screechy Grass Extract] for 6 sec. Enemies inflicted with [Screechy Grass Extract] have their ATK reduced by 30%, and Crit Chance by 500.

3.name: More! Stronger!
3.description: Own ATK is increased by ??? for 20 sec and the effect of [Tears of Mr. Python], [Screechy Grass Extract], [Tickle Tickle Potion] is doubled. Also, target of [Tears of Mr. Python], [Screechy Grass Extract!], [Tickle Tickle Potion] is increased by 1.

4.name: Tickle Tickle Potion
4.description: Upon attack, poisons target enemy with Tickle Tickle Potion for 10 sec which deals a total of ??? P.DMG over time, and cannot be dispelled. Tickle Tickle Potion can be stacked max 50 times.

light.effect: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
For the duration, auto attack DMG is increased by 100%.
[Tickle Tickle Potion!] is stacked 3 at a time.

dark.effect: Upon auto attacking an enemy with 50 or more stacks of Tickle Tickle Potion, deals 200% of ATK as extra P.DMG that ignores DEF.

uw.name: The Flute of Silent Winds Rakshathar
uw.description: Max stack of [Tickle Tickle Potion] is increased to (0). Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing (1) of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
uw.story: A hyper-accurate blowgun made by Requina herself. A special muting piece added at the end makes this already-quiet weapon almost completely silent. As the appearance of Demons began to hurt her business, she decided to utilize anything she could, not just poisons. She sought help from her elementalist friend, who imbued the blowgun with the wind's blessing. This gave the weapon firepower equal to that of a magic cannon. After adding Requina's ultra-deadly, Demon-slaying poison to it, it became a powerful and deadly weapon capable of killing any living being.

1.name: Tear of Venom
1.description: [Tears of Mr. Python!] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration, and increases the skill duration by (0) sec.
1.story: The extract of the root of a Snake Mandrake known to grow only once every hundred years. Requina found it after searching the entire continent to make the deadliest poison. She made the poison, then named it Tear of Mr. Big Snake. The root extract of the Snake Mandrake causes excruciating pain. The agony is actually the gnawing away of the corrupted part of the soul. If one can endure it, their soul can be purified.

2.name: Basilisk's Poisonous Fang
2.description: [Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals (0) of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
2.story: A nasty fang of a Basilisk that only absorbs evil energy. Its poison is actually strong enough to melt souls. If the poison from the fang is mixed up with screechy grass, it could become a tremendous drug that no organism could survive. Requina's heart is beating hard with anticipation.

3.name: Sparkling Potion
3.description: [More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by (0) for the duration.
3.story: Medicine made from boiling the powder of the seventieth rainbow and the tongue of the giant beast Kiselaton who can cross hell. It is full of brilliant colors. The moment one drinks it, it burns the insides, but it is said that whoever drinks it slowly dies in happiness.

4.name: Laughter of Death
4.description: [Tickle Tickle Potion!] Increases DMG by (0). Hit enemies have their P.Crit Resistance reduced by 250.
4.story: Processed pollen of Kraseir, a yellow flower known to make people laugh to death. Although classified as a dangerous and poisonous flower, it is not Kraseir itself that has negative effects. It is actually its pollen that contains neurotoxin. Requina grows the flowers in her garden for a stable supply of Kraseir pollen.

sw.requirement: Charges up upon dealing DMG 70 times.
sw.description: Summons the soul of The Flute of Silent Winds Rakshathar for 10 sec. For the duration of the Soul, deals ??? + ??? P.DMG per each stack of Tickle Tickle Potion inflicted upon the target every sec. The hit target will be Petrified for 1 sec.

advancement.1: Increases All DMG the hit enemy takes by 30% for 10 sec.
advancement.2: Increases the duration of soul by 5 sec.

sw.story:
Recently, Requina noticed a subtle change in the sound of her flute.
Whenever the poison flowed, the flute let out a dark, low-pitched sound to awaken its silence, as if it was responding to Requina's poison.
Just as Requina was concerning if the flute will one day break from her poison, she recalled an elementalist's advice...

'Does this child not have a name yet?
Then please do give it the right name.
Remember that all items strive to become closer to the name their masters give.

Requina then realized what was happening to her flute.
It had finally come.
To greet her precious guest, Requina dropped 'Tears of Mr. Python' into her flute.

The flute responded with a burst of sound, and a large, coiled visage entered Requina's pupil.

It was Mr. Python whom Requina always looked up to.
Requina gave her flute the name of a legendary viper: Rakshathar, and the flute was reborn.
